nodes.text: "Droid Dilemma" is a a mini-comic created by Chris Eliopoulos and Jordie Bellaire that was published in Star Wars 25. It was in memory of Kenny Baker and features the character Baker portrayed, R2-D2.

As the rebels setup a base on LX-Robynsun V, pilot Luke Skywalker is ordered to find a missing freighter. He orders his companion droid R2-D2 to go set up his X-wing starfighter. Along the way, R2 gets caught up in the base's activities. When he finally arrives at the hangar, Skywalker tells him the mission was canceled.
